languages.text: "Нужно немедленно помочь людям, которые остались на средних палубах — быть может, тогда мы остановим эту волну".

traits.locale_text: "Нужно немедленно помочь людям, которые остались на средних палубах — быть может, тогда мы остановим эту волну".

languages.text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."
languages.original_text: "Нужно немедленно помочь людям, которые остались на средних палубах — быть может, тогда мы остановим эту волну".

traits.locale_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this spreading wave of upheaval."
"We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this spreading wave of upheaval."
"We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."
"We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."
"We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

languages.text: “我们必须立刻援助那些仍然在中层甲板上的船员。或许我们可以想办法，阻止这场叛乱继续蔓延。”
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须立刻援助那些仍然在中层甲板上的船员。或许我们可以想办法，阻止这场叛乱继续蔓延。”

languages.text: «Debemos proporcionar asistencia inmediata a los que siguen en las cubiertas intermedias. Tal vez así podamos evitar que se extienda este desastre».
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos proporcionar asistencia inmediata a los que siguen en las cubiertas intermedias. Tal vez así podamos evitar que se extienda este desastre».

languages.text: 「まだ中層デッキにいる者たちにすぐに支援をしなければなりません。そうすればこの波の拡大を阻止できるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはまだ中央デッキにいる人たちに、直ちに支援を提供しなければなりません。そうすればおそらくこの波の拡大を阻止できるかもしれない」
「まだ中層デッキにいる者たちにすぐに支援をしなければなりません。そうすればこの波の拡大を阻止できるかもしれない」

languages.text: « Nous devons fournir de l'aide à ceux qui se trouvent encore sur les ponts intermédiaires. Peut-être parviendrons-nous ainsi à contenir cette vague. »
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons fournir de l'aide à ceux qui se trouvent encore sur les ponts intermédiaires. Peut-être parviendrons-nous ainsi à contenir cette vague. »

languages.text: "Wir müssen die auf den mittleren Decks Verbliebenen umgehend unterstützen. Dann können wir vielleicht verhindern, dass sich diese Welle ausbreitet."
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen die auf den mittleren Decks Verbliebenen umgehend unterstützen. Dann können wir vielleicht verhindern, dass sich diese Welle ausbreitet."

languages.text: "Hâlâ orta güvertede bulunanlara acil yardım sağlamalıyız. Belki o zaman bu dalganın yayılmasını önleyebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "We must provide immediate assistance to those still on the middle decks. Perhaps then we might stop this wave from spreading."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ orta güvertede bulunanlara acil yardım sağlamalıyız. Belki o zaman bu dalganın yayılmasını önleyebiliriz."
